item.title: About Sheil
item.description:
Aspirations

I am currently a Junior in the statistics department at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign looking for internships and co-op opportunities in the Data Analytics and Trading fields. You can find my complete résumé here.

Activities

  • American Nuclear Society Conference 2019: February, Richmond, VA.
    • Poster available here.
  • Duke of Edinburgh International Award Gold Standard: June 2017. Certificate.

Life

Growing up I had the great opportunity to move around the world. I was born in Delhi but I’ve lived in many cities including Kolkata, Bangkok, Dubai, and Cork (It’s a small city in Ireland). I’m very grateful to have met so many people and learned so much from them, I just wish I’d picked up a few more languages! I only speak English, Hindi, and French.
